snippet: Antidoping authorities in southeastern France searched the home of Jeannie Longo on Wednesday and detained her husband on allegations that he illegally imported doping materials.
abstract: Antidoping authorities in southeastern France search the home of the country’s top female cyclist Jeannie Longo, and detain her husband on allegations that he illegally imported doping materials, presumably on her behalf.
lead_paragraph: Antidoping authorities in southeastern France searched the home of Jeannie Longo on Wednesday and detained her husband on allegations that he illegally imported doping materials.

headline.seo: Home of Top Female Cyclist Searched
headline.main: Home of Top Female Cyclist Searched
headline.print_headline: Authorities Search Home Of Top Rider
